name: California Peer-Run Warm Line (Peer-to-Peer Support Works)
description: MHASF's Peer-Run Warm Line is a confidential 24/7 non-emergency emotional support phone and chat line serving residents of California. Peer counselors are available to discuss callers concerns, such as: - Interpersonal relationships - Anxiety, pain and depression - Finances - Alcohol/drug use How to Apply: - Call by phone OR - Send an instant message though online chat Open Hours: - 24 hours daily Service Contact Information: - Phone number: 855-600-9276 - Email: info@mentalhealthsf.org
